title: Top/Jungle main looking for team
body: Current Ranking is Silver 3. Last season was Gold 2 either way I'm around mid gold range if not higher. No exact rank for the team required but would prefer if those within the team were committed to playing regularly and if they had around the same ranked level if not higher as myself. Add me in game if you feel like could be a good addition to your team thank you.

replies.body: LOL THEY THINK THEY ARE SOCIETALLY ENGINEERING DEAR GOD BURN IT WITH FIRE

how can you give a rating when the only game mode option for this game is 5v5 (with .1% 3v3)? how can it be accurate? loony. who are the other 4 players u got that rating with? tell me their names numbers asl number of ex sexual partners their names and numbers etc
